Calculate the number of nodes for this tree.

getSubtree

public Concept getSubtree(int i)
Selects a sub tree.

Parameters:
i - A position in the tree. Positions are iteratively given to nodes by leftmost depth-first search. This allows efficient selection of subtrees. (Implementation does not work if any node has more than two children.)
Returns:
The selected subtree.

getDepth

public int getDepth()
Calculates the tree depth.

Returns:
The depth of this tree.

clone

public Object clone()
Returns a clone of this programm tree. Die positiven und negativen Sets werden dabei nicht mitgeklont, sondern nur parent und children.
